IndividualApplicationTask.name: IndividualApplicationTask
IndividualApplicationTask.description: Represents a task related to an application.

ApplicationDecisionId.description: The Application Decision associated with the Individual Application Task.

ApplicationReviewId.description: The Application Review associated with the Individual Application Task.

ApplicationStageDefinitionId.description: The Application Stage Definition associated with the Application Task.

DueDate.description: The date by which the Individual Application Task must be completed.

EndDateTime.description: The date and time when the Individual Application Task ends.

IndividualApplicationId.description: The Individual Application associated with the Individual Application Task.

IsRequired.description: Indicates whether the Individual Application Task is required (true) or not (false).

Name.description: The name of the Individual Application Task.

PreliminaryApplicationRefId.description: The Preliminary Application Reference associated with the Individual Application Task.

SavedApplicationUrl.description: The URL of a saved application that's associated with the Individual Application Task.

SequenceNumber.description: The sequence in which the Individual Application Task must be performed.

StartDateTime.description: The date and time when the Individual Application Task starts.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the Individual Application Task.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the Individual Application Task.
